name: gulp-autocompletion-zsh
description: Autocompletion support for your gulp.js tasks (zsh).

scripts.postinstall:
DEST=$HOME/.gulp-autocompletion-zsh; mkdir -p $DEST && ln -fs "$PWD/gulp-autocompletion.zsh" $DEST/gulp-autocompletion.zsh && echo source $DEST/gulp-autocompletion.zsh >> $HOME/.zshrc && echo "All done! Please restart your zsh.

"
